articles.author: Chris Fedor, cleveland.com
articles.title: Cavs, back at full strength, rediscover their identity in 126-104 Game 3 rout of Pacers - Cleveland.com
articles.description: The top-seeded Cavs outclassed the Indiana Pacers on Friday night, earning their first win of this second-round series, 126-104, inside Gainbridge Fieldhouse.
articles.content:
INDIANAPOLIS Dont cancel those Eastern Conference finals reservations just yet.
